the-living-world.question: Living organisms are distinguished from non-living objects by their ability for
the-living-world.explanation: Metabolism is the defining property of living organisms according to NCERT.

the-living-world.question: Increase in mass and increase in number of individuals are twin characteristics of
the-living-world.explanation: Reproduction increases number of individuals while growth increases mass.

the-living-world.question: Growth in multicellular organisms occurs by
the-living-world.explanation: Multicellular organisms grow by mitotic cell division.
